alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 8:17AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion, southeastern Covington, Lamar and southeastern Jefferson Davis Counties through 900 AM CST... At 817 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carson to near Improve to Sandy Hook. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Improve around 820 AM CST. Melba around 830 AM CST. Pinebur around 835 AM CST. Sumrall around 845 AM CST. Hattiesburg and Baxterville around 850 AM CST. Oak Grove around 855 AM CST. Lumberton around 900 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bassfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
